snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter dismissed his senior military assistant, Lt. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis — who held a job little known beyond Washington — for unspecified personal misconduct.
abstract: Firing of Lt Gen Ronald F Lewis from position as senior military assistant to Defense Sec Ashton B Carter has drawn national attention to little-known but highly influential role in military; Carter has dismissed Lewis over allegations of misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter dismissed his senior military assistant, Lt. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis — who held a job little known beyond Washington — for unspecified personal misconduct.

headline.main: Dismissed Pentagon General Held Wide Influence Behind the Scenes
headline.print_headline: Dismissed Pentagon General Held Wide Influence Behind the Scenes

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
